title: Payment Event Schema
description: Defines the event our system recognizes as a purchase event

id.description: The unique event identifier (auto-generated if empty)

key.name: Event Key
key.description: This value establishes the type of event being published (i.e. 'purchase')

total.description: The total value of this purchase
